calculator_key1: ## A program to make a calculator
calculator_key3: Is program mai hum calculator ka ek function likhenge jo ki 2 number and ek `operator` dega and uska result return karega
calculator_key4: is function ko agar hum call karta huun aise `calc(5, 10, '*')` to kya `output` hoga
calculator_key5: and agar is function ko aise call kare `calc(5, 10, '%')` to kya putput hoga
calculator_key6: Hum aise cases ke liye kya kar sakte hai?
calculator_key7: Hamesha hum sirf ek limited no of cases ko hi handle kar sakte hai and isilye humme baki `input` ke liye `Not supported` wala case banana chahiye
calculator_key9: Is program mai aap ek aisa case ya `if` `statement` dijeye jo ki saare unwanted `operators` ko handle kare
calculator_key11: Hum yahan pe ye keh rahe hai ki ye program ` +, -, /, * ` ke alawa kisi aur `operator` ko nahi support karta hai
